statements: DELETE FROM TravelData WHERE origin_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM TravelData WHERE passenger_count > 2 AND origin_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM travel_trends WHERE trend_name = 'Outdoor Adventures';
DELETE FROM historical_travel_data WHERE id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM travel_predictions WHERE predicted_demand > 100 AND optimization_strategy = 'Cost';
DELETE FROM travel_trends WHERE trend_name = 'Adventure' AND trend_description LIKE '%outdoors%';
